: : Kup : :
Kup watches at Battera left the base. He hopes she could succede in her mission.
He heald Elita as he went to Rodimus' quarters to put the little one down.
After doing so Kup started to construct a crib. Finally the baby would have a secure bed.
: : Rodimus Prime : :
Inside the CR chamber Rodimus' mind is drifting through memories. He just thinks of Nightlight.
Within his clinched right hand was the jewel that Nightlight had given him.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:Battera::
"SO this Nightlight. She is the bot that the leader lost in the 
batter you just won. I shall go and get her. Let's just pray to the 
Matrix that I can bring back her miserable metal hide."
She then turned and walked to the entrance. She looked to her 
shoulder, with no insignia, she would have to put up a good front for 
the preds. She had the confidence she could do so. She transformed 
into bat mode and started to fly off to the preds base.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Kup : :
> Kup: Slim, black, a panther/bird fuzor. She also has a blue orb of 
some kind on her forehead.
> Kup then hears Elita crying, and picks her up.
> Kup: Did Elita hurt herself? You'll be ok, little lass.
> He holds her to his shoulder.
>  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:Battera::
> Her voice deeper and rougher than before. "Nightlight. What's this 
> bot look like?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : Kup : :
> > Kup: No. Sorry, I was confused as to who you spoke of. Cam is the 
> little one that Windlord is trying to find right now. The bot the 
> Predacons hold as a POW is Nightlight.
> >
